1.1.1.name: wordpress/islamic-graphics
1.1.1.description:
A simple set of shortcodes to allow authors to insert graphics that represent the common Islamic phrases: SAW, RA, SWT and AS, into Wordpress posts and pages.

Phrases included: * 'alayhis salam * rahimaha Allah * rahimahu Allah * rahimahum Allah * radiallahu anha * radiallahu anhu * radiallahu anhum * sallalahu 'alayhi wa salam * subhanahu wa ta 'ala

Both black and white versions of each graphic are included. Romanized text and the English translation can also be inserted to assist readers who do not know Arabic.

Plugin produced by http://MuslimMatters.org
